    • Uses of Social in com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.social

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Social SocialService.getFacebookFriendsFromAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
      This function returns a list of facebook friends of the specified user using a given authorization token.
      Social SocialService.getFacebookFriendsFromLinkUser(java.lang.String userName)
      This function returns a list of facebook friends of the specified user by accessing the facebook account.
      Social SocialService.getFacebookProfile(java.lang.String accessToken)
      Fetch the profile info like profile pic ,facebookID and user name based on facebook access token.
      Social SocialService.getFacebookProfilesFromIds(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> facebookIds)
      Get the facebook profile info for the gives IDs.
      Social SocialService.linkUserFacebookAccount(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String accessToken)
      Links the User Facebook access credentials to the App User account.
      Social SocialService.linkUserFacebookAccount(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String accessToken, java.lang.String appId, java.lang.String appSecret)
      Links the User Facebook access credentials to the App User account.

      Links the User LinkedIn access credentials to the App User account.

      Social SocialService.updateFacebookStatus(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String status)
      Updates the Facebook status of the specified user.
